TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StackOverflowException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class StackOverflowException Inherits SystemException
public ref class StackOverflowException sealed : SystemException

summary.span: 例外狀況，擲回於執行堆疊因為包含過多巢狀方法呼叫而溢位時。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the execution stack overflows because it contains too many nested method calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `StackOverflowException` 執行堆疊溢位錯誤，通常會發生的非常深或無限遞迴函式會擲回。`StackOverflowException` is thrown for execution stack overflow errors, typically in case of a very deep or unbounded recursion. 因此請確定您的程式碼沒有無限迴圈或無限遞迴。So make sure your code doesn't have an infinite loop or infinite recursion. `StackOverflowException` 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_STACKOVERFLOW，其值 0x800703E9。`StackOverflowException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_STACKOVERFLOW, which has the value 0x800703E9. Intermediate language (IL) 指令則會擲回`StackOverflowException`。The intermediate language (IL) instruction throws `StackOverflowException`. 如需初始屬性值的清單`StackOverflowException`資訊，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for a `StackOverflowException` object, see the constructors. 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，您不能攔截`StackOverflowException`物件`try` / `catch`區塊，以及對應的處理序終止的預設值。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, you can't catch a `StackOverflowException` object with a `try`/`catch` block, and the corresponding process is terminated by default. 因此，您應該撰寫您的程式碼來偵測並防止堆疊溢位。Consequently, you should write your code to detect and prevent a stack overflow. 例如，如果您的應用程式相依於遞迴，使用計數器或狀態的條件來終止遞迴迴圈。For example, if your app depends on recursion, use a counter or a state condition to terminate the recursive loop. 請參閱 （如需這項技術的圖例 Examples)(#examples) 區段。See the (Examples)(#examples) section for an illustration of this technique. > [!NOTE] > 套用屬性的方法，就會擲回`StackOverflowException`沒有任何作用。Applying the attribute to a method that throws a `StackOverflowException` has no effect. 您仍然無法處理的例外狀況，從使用者程式碼。You still cannot handle the exception from user code. 如果您的應用程式裝載 common language runtime (CLR)，它可以指定 CLR 應該卸載的應用程式定義域，其中就會發生堆疊溢位例外狀況，而讓對應的程序繼續執行。If your app hosts the common language runtime (CLR), it can specify that the CLR should unload the application domain where the stack overflow exception occurs and let the corresponding process continue. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ICLRPolicyManager 介面](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-interface.md)。For more information, see [ICLRPolicyManager Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-interface.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用計數器，以確保遞迴數目呼叫`Execute`方法不會超過 MAX_RECURSIVE_CALLS 常數所定義的最大值。The following example uses a counter to ensure that the number of recursive calls to the `Execute` method do not exceed a maximum defined by the MAX_RECURSIVE_CALLS constant. [!code-csharp[System.StackOverflowException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.stackoverflowexception.class/cs/example1a.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.StackOverflowException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.stackoverflowexception.class/vb/example1a.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，設定新執行個體的 屬性為描述錯誤的系統提供訊息，例如「要求的作業造成堆疊溢位」。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The requested operation caused a stack overflow."

summary.span: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

span.span: This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: message 的內容必須能讓人瞭解。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
